title: Add TemplateWithBeads example template
description:
Add new const to internal/config/config.go:
TemplateWithBeads showing multi-line output with beads widget on second line.
Format: Line1 has model/dir/branch/context, Line2 has beads stats and next task.
Include in code comments as example for users.

title: Integrate beads stats fetching in status.Builder.Build()
description:
Update Build() method:
- Check if beads provider is enabled
- If enabled, fetch stats via cache with configured TTL
- Populate StatusData beads fields from Stats
- Handle errors gracefully (log and continue without beads data)

title: Add BeadsProvider interface to status.Builder
description:
Update internal/status/status.go:
- Add BeadsProvider interface with IsEnabled() bool and GetStats() (beads.Stats, error)
- Add beads field to Builder struct
- Update NewBuilder to initialize beads client if .beads/ exists
- Update NewBuilderWithDeps to accept BeadsProvider parameter

title: Write unit tests for beads caching
description:
Update internal/cache/cache_test.go with tests for:
- GetBeadsStats with fresh fetch
- GetBeadsStats with cached value (within TTL)
- GetBeadsStats with expired cache (after TTL)
- Error handling when fetchFn fails

title: Write unit tests for internal/beads package
description:
Create internal/beads/beads_test.go with tests for:
- IsEnabled() with and without .beads/ directory
- GetStats() with mocked bd commands
- JSON parsing for bd stats output
- JSON parsing for bd ready output
- Timeout handling
- Error cases (command failure, invalid JSON)

title: Implement beads.Client.GetStats() method
description:
Implement GetStats() that:
- Runs 'bd stats --json' to get open/in_progress/blocked counts
- Runs 'bd ready --limit 1 --json' to get next task title and ID
- Parses JSON responses into Stats struct
- Truncates NextTask title to 40 chars if needed
- Uses 2-second timeout for each command
- Returns error if bd command fails or JSON parsing fails

title: Add GetBeadsStats to CacheProvider interface and implement in cache.Manager
description:
Update caching layer:
- Add GetBeadsStats(ttl time.Duration, fetchFn func() (beads.Stats, error)) method to CacheProvider interface
- Implement in cache.Manager with TTL-based invalidation
- Store beads stats in cache with expiration timestamp
- Return cached value if not expired, otherwise call fetchFn

title: Add BeadsTTL config field with 60s default
description:

- Add BeadsTTL int json field to Config struct
- Set default to 60 in Default() function
- Add merge logic in LoadFrom() for non-zero values

description:

title: Add beads widget to status line
Create internal/beads package with Stats struct and Client
description:
Create new package internal/beads with:
- Stats struct (Open, InProgress, Blocked int; NextTask, NextTaskID string)
- Client struct with workDir field
- Commander interface for dependency injection (like git package)
- IsEnabled() bool method - checks for .beads/ directory existence
- 2-second timeout constant

title: Add beads fields to template.StatusData
description:
Add 6 new fields to StatusData struct:
- BeadsEnabled bool - true if .beads/ directory exists
- BeadsOpen int - count of open issues
- BeadsInProgress int - count of in_progress issues
- BeadsBlocked int - count of blocked issues
- BeadsNextTask string - title of next ready task
- BeadsNextTaskID string - ID of next ready task
